channel.title: Letters to my Kids on Ian Teda
channel.description: Recent content in Letters to my Kids on Ian Teda

item.title: Your Character
item.description: A letter to my children, The best index to a person's character is how he treats people who can't do him any good, and how he treats people who can't fight back. Abigail Van Buren Your character is essentially what you do, your actions. And your actions are largely a result of your habits.

item.title: Life Is Hard, And That Is Good!
item.description: A letter to my Children, Real difficulties can be overcome; it is only the imaginary ones that are unconquerable. Theodore N. Vail Life is not all sun shine, unicorns and rainbows. Life is hard, it is meant to be hard and that is good!

item.title: Know Yourself, Be Yourself, Love Yourself
